intro.title: Our Facility
intro.subtitle: Designed for results
intro.content: We take pride in our state of the art facilities. Always clean, always working and always ready to use and get you your dream body.

facilityFeatures.title: Weights section
facilityFeatures.content: Weight lifting isn't just about bulking up and building muscle mass, the experts say. Its benefits include improved posture, better sleep, gaining bone density, maintaining weight loss, boosting metabolism, lowering inflammation and staving off chronic disease, among a laundry list of positives.
facilityFeatures.name: Weights

facilityFeatures.title: Weights section
facilityFeatures.content: Just another angle of our weights section and all we have to offer in this section.
facilityFeatures.name: Weights

facilityFeatures.title: Cardio section
facilityFeatures.content: When it comes to cardiovascular exercises, the options are endless to improve your overall quality of life.
facilityFeatures.name: Cardio

facilityFeatures.title: Leg's section
facilityFeatures.content: Leg workouts are an important aspect of a balanced, whole-body fitness routine that builds strength, speed, and stability. Lower-body muscles create a strong, stable foundation. Rooting your lower body into the ground helps to create resistance that travels upward into your core and upper body.
facilityFeatures.name: Legs

facilityFeatures.title: Spinning studio
facilityFeatures.name: Spinning studio
facilityFeatures.content: Come join a spinning class with us today!!!
